mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def analyze_text(text):
    stop_words = set(['the', 'is', 'a', 'and', 'it', 'with', 'while'])
    clean_text = re.sub('', '', text)
    words = clean_text.lower().split()
    words = [word for word in words if word not in stop_words]
    word_count = Counter(words)
    top_words = word_count.most_common(3)
    return (word_count, top_words)

import re
from collections import Counter

def analyze_text(text):
    stop_words = set(['the', 'is', 'a', 'and', 'it', 'with', 'while'])
    clean_text = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', text)
    words = clean_text.lower().split()
    words = [word for word in words if word not in stop_words]
    word_count = Counter(words)
    top_words = word_count.most_common(3)
    return (word_count, top_words)

import re
from collections import Counter

def analyze_text(text):
    stop_words = set(['the', 'is', 'a', 'and', 'it', 'with', 'while'])
    clean_text = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', text)
    words = clean_text.lower().split()
    words = [word for word in words if word in stop_words]
    word_count = Counter(words)
    top_words = word_count.most_common(3)
    return (word_count, top_words)
